entry.summary:
If you farmed @ZircuitL2 you can now claim your $ZRC allocation. Token is non-transferable for now and only lands in your wallet after 24hrs. 7% of the token supply is allocated to Season I and a Season II has already started. Mainnet to go live soon. https://claim.zircuit.com/airdrop
